issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
In https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.map/blob/master/android/src/ti/map/AnnotationProxy.java#L224 


I see a little issue:

`toImage()` creates a KrollProxy, but the statement aspects a blob.

http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/javadoc/org/appcelerator/titanium/proxy/TiViewProxy.html#toImage()

 I see an error in IDE, but I can build the  module. 

Not tested, but this is redfree:  
`TiBlob imageBlob = (TiBlob)((TiViewProxy) obj).toImage().get("media");`

comments.body: Hello, Thanks for reporting this. Can you go ahead and create a PR? Thanks.
